title: For Her Son's Love
description: To: RachelFrom: AndrewRe: I've met the most fascinating single mom...Everyone thinks I'm this high-living playboy....I wish I could reveal my real mission in life: rescuing missing children. Though right now, helping Miranda Jones is my top priority. Shecame to Chestnut Grove with her little boy, but a brewing scandal is threatening their littlefamily. So, cousin and mother-to-be, as I'mrunning the charitable Noble Foundation inyour temporary absence, I'll also be digging upsecrets of the past. And while I'm at it, I hopeMiranda will say yes to a future together!
author: Kathryn Springer
